thread.title: French Bull Brings Color And Design To Their First Luggage Collection
thread.title_full: French Bull Brings Color And Design To Their First Luggage Collection - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: French Bull Brings Color And Design To Their First Luggage Collection
text:
French Bull
NEW YORK , Oct. 26, On October 25th , French Bull launched their first-ever luggage collection, including totes, overnighters and rollers.
Founded by creative visionary Jackie Shapiro in 2002, French Bull products can be found in design-centric retailers in the US and internationally.
The entry into luggage adds another exciting category to their already expansive repertoire of brilliantly designed, fun alternatives to everyday products. The collection includes three capsules, 'Vee,' 'Jet Set,' and 'Sugar' with tote bags, overnighters, and rolling pieces combining functional features with fun surprises such as the ' Ciao Dirty Laundry ' bag that is included inside the large and small rollers.
"Lately, I've been using smaller luggage in my everyday travels. For quickie business trips, weekend getaways, and as a train commuter," says Jackie. "As far as style goes, the black roller and tote no longer feel right to me. I designed this line to make a fun vivid statement while maintaining the quality and functionality that we all need from luggage."
French Bull Luggage landed October 25, 2015. To learn more please visit www.FrenchBull.com/Luggage .
ABOUT FRENCH BULL: FRENCH BULL debuted in 2002 with a line of tableware acclaimed for its mastery of pattern and color. Today, their celebratory style and LIVE VIVIDâ„¢ message can be found across a wide range of categories including kitchen appliances, home decor, and fashion accessories. For more information, visit www.frenchbull.com .
